Headline: #157 Streeterville/Taylor Temporary Northbound Reroute near Mies Van Der Rohe Way/Chicago
ShortDescription: Northbound 157 Streeterville/Taylor buses are temporarily rerouted via Mies Van Der Rohe, Pearson, Dewitt and Chestnut: near Mies Van Der Rohe Way/Chicago.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Northbound #157 Streeterville/Taylor buses are temporarily rerouted via Mies Van Der Rohe, Pearson, Dewitt, Chestnut and over regular route: due to police activity near Mies Van Der Rohe Way/Chicago.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 63rd- Ashland- bound Green Line Service Delayed at Indiana
ShortDescription: 63rd- Ashland- bound Green Line trains are standing at Indiana due to a sick rider. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
63rd-bound Green Line trains are standing at Indiana due to sick customer.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
